thread.title_full: special birthday - Review of Hotel De Petris, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Mick N
title: special birthday - Review
text: five minutes from the metro at ,Barberini, so was easy to find. At reception we was able to communicate well. The room was large with its own bathroom, no tea making facilities but it did have a stocked fridge ,at your on risk, not free. As we were room only I am unable to comment on the food front. Nearby we did find a bar/ coffee shop which done good hot and cold food. Our location had us very near the Trevi fountain and our walks to the Vatican and Colosseum were no more than 30 minutes at a stroll.
